description:
Take off in the fast track. With lightweight carbon construction, these poles are primed for skiers who move with a purpose. The grip and tip are designed to shave weight without compromising performance.

  • 16mm carbon fibre construction is strong and light
  • Click in strap for snug and secure adjustment at the wrist
  • Non-slip Nordic 2K rubber grip
  • Nordic trail ultralight basket
  • Tungsten carbide tip handles icy sections
name: Komperdell Nordic CX-100 Sport Poles
